definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to form one's own group or school of thought/to set up one's own business/to establish oneself
open door policy/Egyptian President Sadat's infitah policy towards investment and relations with Israel
to live apart from parents (of married couple)/to achieve independence

sentences.english: In addition to governance concerns, this part discusses staffing and portal operations.
sentences.chinese: 除管理問題外，本部分還討論員工管理和門戶操作。

sentences.english: In this article we provide you with some common sense guidelines for setting your own portal governance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文將向您介紹設置門戶管理策略的一些常識性指南。

sentences.english: What kinds of operating systems can you use to implement the portal?
sentences.chinese: 可以使用哪幾種操作系統實現門戶？

sentences.english: This person creates virtual portals and typically manages the shared resources.
sentences.chinese: 這個人創建了虛擬門戶並且往往管理這一共享資源。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the search engine is only an accessorial tool in some famous portal sites.
sentences.chinese: 起初，搜索引擎只是一些著名門戶網站的輔助工具。

sentences.english: Yongdeng County, which has a long history, is the gateway of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 永登縣歷史悠久，是通往河西走廊的門戶。

sentences.english: Design constraints indicate anything unique in a customer environment to which the portal will need to conform.
sentences.chinese: 設計限制表示門戶需要遵循的客戶環境中的特殊要求。

sentences.english: Lu'anzhou port under construction will be the largest gateway to the outside world of Changzhou.
sentences.chinese: 在建的常州錄安洲港，是常州最大的對外開放門戶。

sentences.english: I want a portal combined or integrated with a business directory.
sentences.chinese: 我希望有一個門戶網站合併或企業目錄中。

sentences.english: The function of stomata in plants is controlling gas exchange and modulating water balance.
sentences.chinese: 氣孔是植物控制氣體交換和調節水分散失的門戶。

sentences.english: One portal implementation might address the needs of many user communities.
sentences.chinese: 一個門戶實現可以滿足許多用戶羣體的需求。

sentences.english: Myself also thinks the website of trade family status that does verticality has an outlook.
sentences.chinese: 我自己也認爲做垂直性的行業門戶網站是有前途的。

sentences.english: Massive data dumps and even friendly online government portals are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 大量的數據轉儲和甚而友好的網上政府門戶是不足的。

sentences.english: One of the top five news portals is Google News.
sentences.chinese: 五大新聞門戶網站之一是谷歌新聞。

sentences.english: Organizations typically have a very clear picture of what purpose a portal should serve.
sentences.chinese: 組織對於門戶所應具有的用途通常是非常明確的。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
